Docs.summary: Looks up files using embedded resources in the specified assembly. This file system is case sensitive.

Docs.param: The path that identifies the directory
Docs.summary: Enumerate a directory at the given path, if any. This file system uses a flat directory structure. Everything under the base namespace is considered to be one directory.
Docs.returns: True if a directory was located at the given path
